name: flynasTravelAssistant
0:
”Alexa, open flynas”
”Alexa, ask flynas about holiday offers”
”Alexa, Launch flynas”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: flynas
des:
flynas is the first private low-cost airline in Saudi Arabia. You can book flights across the Middle East, Europe & Asia With flynas At affordable fare. flynas served 54 destinations across 99 routes; the airline has Dammam, Jeddah, and Riyadh as operating bases.

The skill triggers a FAQ bot that resolves frequently asked Questions and queries related to flight booking, baggage allowances, nasmiles, and more. The skill helps users resolve the most commonly faced issue, FAQs and solve doubts about pre-booking and post-flight booking journeys. 

Special assistance queries for expectant mothers, infants and children traveling, and passengers with restricted mobility? We’ll answer it all.

Are you facing an issue related to payment or boarding pass? No worries, we answer it all to make your flynas journey smooth and easy.

To Get Started, Simply Say - Alexa, open flynas.

Feel free to inquire about group bookings, special passenger needs, about nasmiles, holiday packages, or payment issues by saying the specific query you're interested in to learn more.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
